result.eng: We worked together to fix the problem.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteachWe worked together to fix the problem.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag obair as láṁa a ċéile ċun an ḟaḋb a réiteaċWe worked together to fix the problem.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ga: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.orig: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.html: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ponchtml: Fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: They extended their hands as a sign of peace.
result.ga: Shín siad a lámha amach mar chomartha síochána
result.orig: Shín siad a lámha amach mar chomartha síochána
result.html: Shín siad a lámha amach mar chomartha síochánaThey extended their hands as a sign of peace.
result.ponchtml: Ṡín siad a láṁa amaċ mar ċomarṫa síoċánaThey extended their hands as a sign of peace.

result.ga: Tá an láithreán seo idir lámha
result.orig: Tá an láithreán seo idir lámha
result.html: Tá an láithreán seo idir lámhaThis site is under construction.
result.ponchtml: Tá an láiṫreán seo idir láṁaThis site is under construction.

result.html: Tá do lámha fuarYour hands are cold.
result.ponchtml: Tá do láṁa fuarYour hands are cold.

result.eng: They are engaged in a new project.
result.ga: Tá tionscnamh nua idir lámha acu
result.orig: Tá tionscnamh nua idir lámha acu
result.html: Tá tionscnamh nua idir lámha acuThey are engaged in a new project.
result.ponchtml: Tá tionscnaṁ nua idir láṁa acuThey are engaged in a new project.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
